entities.name: SYSTRAN SAS
entities.description: A company that provides and manages internal IT resources and systems, operating under an IT charter to ensure security, confidentiality, performance, and compliance with legal and regulatory provisions regarding data.

entities.name: Systran Information System
entities.description: The information system provided by SYSTRAN to its personnel, governed by an IT charter to promote fair, responsible, and secure usage.

entities.name: IT Resources
entities.description: Computer resources provided by SYSTRAN for use by its personnel, subject to the IT charter for proper usage and functioning.

entities.eventName: French Data Protection Law (Loi Informatique et Libertés)
entities.description: Law n° 78-17 of January 6, 1978, concerning data processing, files and freedoms, modified by law n° 2004-801 of August 6, 2004, which SYSTRAN commits to respect.
General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) became applicable, which SYSTRAN commits to respect.
